effect_entries.effect: Raises the user's Defense by two stages.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises the user's Defense by two stages.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Hardens the body’s surface
to sharply raise DEFENSE.

Hardens the body’s surface
to sharply raise DEFENSE.

The user hardens
its body’s surface
to sharply raise its
DEFENSE stat.

The user hardens
its body’s surface
like iron, sharply
raising its Defense
stat.

The user hardens
its body’s surface
like iron, sharply
raising its Defense
stat.

The user hardens
its body’s surface
like iron, sharply
raising its Defense
stat.

L’épiderme du lanceur devient dur comme
du fer, ce qui augmente considérablement
sa Défense.

The user hardens its body’s surface
like iron, sharply raising its
Defense stat.

The user hardens its body’s surface
like iron, sharply raising its
Defense stat.

ひふを　てつのように
かたくする　ことで
じぶんの　ぼうぎょを　ぐーんと　あげる。

피부를 쇠처럼
단단하게 함으로써
자신의 방어를 크게 올린다.

L’épiderme du lanceur devient dur comme du fer,
ce qui augmente considérablement sa Défense.

Anwender stärkt den Körper, um den
Verteidigungs-Wert stark zu erhöhen.

Fortalece el cuerpo como si fuera de hierro y sube
mucho la Defensa.

Il corpo di chi la usa si indurisce come il ferro,
facendone salire di molto la Difesa.

The user hardens its body’s surface
like iron, sharply raising its
Defense stat.

皮膚を　鉄のように
硬くする　ことで
自分の　防御を　ぐーんと　あげる。

ひふを　てつのように
かたくする　ことで
じぶんの　ぼうぎょを　ぐーんと　あげる。
